title: PNP service is very good & reasonably priced
text: Visited Alibaug on a day trip recently and took the PNP ferry from Gateway to Mandwa and back. The ferry to Mandwa in the mid-morning was on time and it was quite packed being a Saturday. The return ferry in the evening was a few minutes late. The seating is comfortable and the cabin is airconditioned. There are speedboats that do the same trip but they are much more expensive and just a few minutes faster, We preferred to travel in a larger boat and in airconditioned comfort

title: Warm, hospitable, very clean rooms and outstanding food
text: I have stayed at Dina several times over the years and was there for a short visit during the off-season period. I was last there in 2014 and was very happy to see that they continue to maintain their high standards even though the property is now over 100 years old. The tollets were recently renovated, service was excellent and the food was outstanding, as expected. They over feed you with 4 to 5 course meals for breakfast, lunch and dinner!!, Most definitely recommend the hotel to anyone visiting Mahabalershwar

title: Once popular now empty
text: Visited the restaurant around 9 pm on a weekday along with a friend who has been visiting the restaurant fairly regularly for many years. It used to be a very busy restaurant and one needed to wait to get a table because there were no reservations. We were very surprised to see that there was no one else in the restaurant when we walked in. We were there for an hour and apart from one or two food delivery boys, the only other customer was a man who walked in when we were leaving. Food quality was average - the thali is cheaper than other restaurants but it's very simple as well, Not sure if I will visit again

title: Very good food but very few customers
text: The restaurant is recently opened in the current location and I believe it was located in Khar earlier. We visited for dinner on a weekday evening because of the very good ratings on various sites and were not disappointed. Both the seafood thali and chicken thali very excellent and quantities more than enough for one person. Unable to understand why there were hardly any other customers that evening - perhaps it's the location on a very busy road. Hope they get more clients soon otherwise it may become another casualty in the competitive restaurant business in this city

title: Excellent small restaurant
text: Located on the busy Colaba Causeway, this small restaurant has a steady stream of customers. There are only a few tables and so you should be ready to wait or share a table with someone else. Food choices are very good - Parsi & continental fare and service is prompt. They don't accept credit or debit cards

title: Excellent location and very good cleanliness standard
text: We were very happy with our overnight stay at this hotel. It is located in a quiet lane just off the busy Colaba causeway. The room was spacious and both the toilet and the room were very clean. Decent complimentary breakfast as well. It caters mainly to tourists but is a good choice for a business stay as well

title: Delayed flight, lack lustre service and shabby interiors
text: This was a 747-400 flight for a short Delhi-Mumbai sector. Flight was delayed by over 2 hours partly because of late arrival of the previous flight and disorganized boarding process. It was a really old aircraft with shabby interiors - the seat pockets were torn, toilet needed renovation and everything looked old inside the aircraft. Service was also mediocre with the crew just doing their job mechanically. Will think twice before flying Air India again

title: Very popular with the young crowd
text: Visited the restaurant on a Saturday evening and it got really crowded with youngsters - my guess was that most of them were in their late teens or early 20s at best. Service was very good despite the crowds. Music was much too loud but it was stuff that the youngsters enjoyed a lot. One concern - almost everyone there was below 25 and many of them were drinking hard liquor (The legal age limit for hard liquor in Maharashtra is 25). Am guessing this a violation that many restaurants that cater to the young crowd manage to get away with.

title: Decent buffet breakfast with local and other cuisines
text: The buffet breakfast is very reasonably priced and certainly excellent value for money. Apart from the usual items served at all hotels, this cafe also offer local dishes as part of the buffet, Very good service as well
place: Citrus Cafe, Lemon Tree Hotel, Amritsar

title: Fabulous local food at reasonable prices
text: We thoroughly enjoyed our meal here - the paratha thali and the rajma-chawal plate were both excellent. Service was prompt and prices very reasonable - highly recommended

title: Badly maintained
text: We were disappointed to see that this monument is badly maintained. Perhaps there were repairs going on but we didn't stay more than 5 minutes because there was nothing to see

title: Amazing peace and tranquility
text: This shrine is a must-visit irrespective of your religious beliefs or lack thereof. It gets thousands of visitors from early morning to late night and everything is well organized by volunteers. There is so much peace and positive energy in the place that it is worthwhile just sitting around the water body and absorbing some of that energy,

title: Fabulous food at very reasonable prices
text: This food outlet is very famous and lives up to its reputation for excellent food at very reasonable prices. Highly recommended vegetarian restaurant

title: Nationalistic fervour parade
text: The evening parade on both sides of the border is a very popular attraction that draws thousands of people everyday, even though it is quite far from Amritsar town. The armed forces whip up everyone's nationalistic feelings and it is worth watching they march and show aggression to the opposite side

title: Very well curated
text: This is a must-see attraction of Amritsar - it opened just 2 years ago and is very well curated in multiple languages. Very moving for many Indians whose families were affected by the partition in 1947, Only suggestion would be to have an audio guided tour - which would make the visit even more worthwhile

title: Wonderful museum of photography equipment
text: This museum is the personal collection of Mr Arya who has collected a wide range of photographic equipment across the ages, including some rare cameras. The displays are very informative and the museum is certainly worth visiting - a hidden gem

title: Beautiful gardens with many monuments
text: Sunder Nursery is spread over a large area of 30 acres and it has beautiful and well maintained gardens as well as monuments. The security guards are vigilant to tell visitors to keep off the grassy areas so that they remain undisturbed. Nice place to stroll around and enjoy some peace and quiet

title: Excellent and well kept monument
text: We enjoyed our visit to Humayun's Tomb recently - well kept gardens and overall cleanliness and maintenance of the buildings were very good. It wasn't very busy on a Monday morning and so we could walk around without crowds and got our entry tickets quickly as well. Highly recommended attraction to visit

title: Value for money, clean rooms and friendly staff
text: We enjoyed our short overnight stay at the hotel. Very reasonably priced rooms. They allowed us to check in early and the room was clean and well appointed with tea/coffee and water complimentary. Breakfast buffet in the coffee shop was decent and quite cheap. Overall highly recommended to others

title: Friendly service but delayed by an hour
text: The flight was delayed by an hour and we were advised in advance and so didn't have to wait for long at the airport. On board service was friendly. Baggage delivery took a bit too long - I guess because the arrival gate was far from the baggage delivery area

title: On time flight and prompt service
text: I was flying by Air India after a long time and was worried whether the flight would be on time - was pleasantly surprised to see that boarding was smooth (despite it being a large aircraft) and departure was on time. The snack served on board was mediocre though

title: Lack lustre service
text: While check-in was handled smoothly, the boarding process took quite long because of long lines and waiting to board the coach to the plane. On board service was mediocre - cabin staff were indifferent - even when serving the F&B for sale, they didn't ask politely whether a passenger would like to purchase a drink or a snack but instead said "anything to buy?". Flight was on time and baggage delivery was prompt - both positives

title: Lively restaurant and friendly service
text: The restaurant is well-lit and has a lively atmosphere. Service is friendly and quick. We enjoyed the salad and pizza we ordered. Alcohol is also reasonably priced. Overall a fun evening

title: Old favourite - still awesome
text: K Rustom Ice Cream has been around for several decades and it still remains fabulous. Prices are extremely reasonable and the outlet is very popular even quite late at night. Don't miss the sandwich ice cream which comes in many flavours

title: Very good tapas but limited choices
text: Having visited several tapas restaurants in Spain, USA and other countries, I know that there is quite a vast range of tapas dishes. Uno Mas has a relatively limited range of tapas, especially in the non-vegetarian section. Otherwise, we enjoyed our meal. Classy interiors. Service was friendly and relatively quick and the food quality was good as well

title: Poor service standards and mediocre food
text: We had a bad experience at our recent dinner there. We decided to go to the restaurant because of the very good reviews on another portal (not TripAdvisor). It was quite late and we requested the waiter to recommend a starter that they could serve immediately apart from the main course items ordered. He recommended a chicken starter, which never arrived. Instead our main course items arrived after a few minutes, without any apology or explanation about our starter. When the bill arrived, they keep a few wrapped mints in the saucer with the bill and we were shocked to see an empty used wrapper there - which we pointed out to the waiter, We decided to not pay the service charge because of the shoddy service and they agreed to remove it from the bill - but to our surprise they only subtracted the service charge without adjusting the taxes levied on the service charge - third service issue in one evening!!. The manager was not in the restaurant and so we could not escalate the issues we faced - 4th service issue!!, The main course items we ordered were nothing special as well - relatively small portions and lots of oil in the chicken item. I will not visit the restaurant again

title: Open space to relax by the sea
text: This is a very nice part of Larchmont and the park is on the sea shore - so an excellent place to walk, stroll with your dog or to play with your kids

title: Iconic food outlet
text: Walter's hot dogs are part of the local culture of Larchmont and it was busy when we stopped by on a warm Sunday afternoon. We had to stand in a short line and service took a few minutes but the food was excellent and we enjoyed our meal at one of the tables in the garden next to the food stall.

title: Excellent Turkish food
text: The restaurant is located off the beaten track and serves excellent Turkish cuisine. The staff were very friendly and helpful and service was quick. Prices were very reasonable - highly recommended

title: Classy restaurant
text: We were running late and the staff kindly kept our table reservation even though it was a busy Saturday evening. We loved the cocktails and the food. Prices are a bit high but I guess that's expected in a classy restaurant

title: So many choices of cuisines
text: Amazing choice of cuisines available at this food truck park - so there;s food for everyone's palates. There's also place to sit on the grass and enjoy your meal

title: Excellent lobster dishes
text: We enjoyed the dishes we ordered from their outlet at the Smorgasburg park in Brooklyn. Service was prompt and prices were reasonable

title: Wonderful food
text: It's amazing how well organized these guys are because they do huge amount of sales and need to keep their small food truck stocked with all the items on the menu and maintain hygiene as well. Food was served immediately and it was very tasty

title: Slick performance
text: My son gave me a surprise gift to watch Dan White's show with him. We were right in the front and so could see everything clearly ,,,, well not clear enough to catch the magician's tricks and he certainly has many of them. The show is entertaining and executed to perfection so that no one can figure out how the tricks are done
place: The Magician at the NoMad Hotel

title: Enjoyable lunch
text: Normally airport restaurants don't have good food and service but this one is different. The waiting staff are very friendly and helpful and the food is very tasty. Prices are also quite reasonable

title: Excellent Japanese food at very reasonable prices
text: This restaurant (Ramen-Ya) is also known as Kurobuta Izakaya - based on the signage and menu. We enjoyed a quick lunch here since we were in a hurry to get to the airport. Food was excellent and prices were very reasonable (since Japanese restaurants tend to be a bit expensive in most places)

title: Excellent jazz bar
text: We enjoyed our time at this jazz bar since the music was excellent. The musicians were enjoying their playing and the bar was quite crowded, which added to the buzz of the place. There was no cover charge to enter the place and one is expected to leave a tip for the band, which is normal

title: Very average food and service
text: The restaurant was quite empty when we visited it - perhaps because it was late in the afternoon. They have set menu options and we tried a couple of them. The staff allowed us to change one of the items, which was nice. However, food quality was quite average and we left a bit disappointed with our meal experience

title: Relaxed and scenic cruise
text: We enjoyed the 90 minute cruise since the boat was not crowded and the guide made excellent announcements about the places we were passing by on the cruise. Drinks service on board is a bit slow but it's OK since nothing is rushed during the cruise
place: Le Bateau-Mouche Sightseeing Cruise in Montreal

title: Small and busy area
text: Chinatown in Montreal is much smaller that the China towns that we have seen in other major cities in the US and elsewhere. It's a busy area and quite crowded with lots of restaurants and shops on the main road where the locality is situated. We walked through this area a few times during our short stay in Montreal

title: Huge green space and super views
text: We enjoyed the time we spent walking around this huge park. Even on a weekday morning it was busy with joggers, other walkers and lots of tourists - but still not crowded. So one can choose one's leisurely pace to soak in the sights of this huge park.

title: Nice walk to reach the cross but the cross itself is not spectacular
text: We enjoyed the short trek in the wooded areas to reach the cross and to descend from there to the nearest bust stop. Since it was September, the weather was pleasant. The cross itself is not spectacular compared to crosses that one sees on the top of hills at other major cities around the world

title: Excellent place to visit
text: There's lots to see in the Old Montreal area in terms of beautiful buildings, restaurants, shops and people walking around. We took a walking tour and learnt a lot about the history of this area - very worthwhile 2+ hours spent there

title: Wonderful area to walk around
text: The old port area has lots of space to walk, jog or bike - in the right weather of course. One can just have an easy stroll and enjoy the sights along the river

title: Really beautiful cathedral
text: Built on the lines of the Notre Dame Basilica in Paris, this is a must see attraction of Montreal. There is a small entrance fee but you also get the benefit of a free tour guide - there are many who are part of the Basilica staff and give a detailed explanation of the history of the Basilica for free. The stained glass windows are spectacular and there are quiet areas where you can pray without being disturbed. They also have a free organ recital. Please find out the timings and do your best to attend it

title: Excellent cocktails and food
text: We came across this restaurant when walking around the area a bit late in the evening. Loved the ambience from the outside and decided to walk in. We loved the cocktails and the food and service was also prompt and friendly - highly recommended

title: Too touristy
text: We were not impressed with our visit to the marketplace. Lots of shops and restaurants all catering to tourists - so was wary about being in a tourist trap. The restaurants with a view of the waterfront are quite expensive. We finally chose a small Chinese restaurant inside for lunch and were happy with our choice. If you enjoy people watching, then there's lots of eye candy for you ;-)

title: Busy with lots of tourists
text: Pier 39 has lots of restaurants, shops and other attractions, including several street musicians, so it tends to be quite crowded and busy all the time. I was careful with my wallet, since I am wary of pick-pockets in any touristic place. We wandered around till we found a nice restaurant to have lunch on a sunny afternoon

title: Excellent food at reasonable prices
text: We loved our dinner at this Korean restaurant which we came across by chance when walking around downtown Toronto. The waiter guided us on the food to order and also helped to serve us. Food was tasty and prices not expensive

title: Classy theatre
text: We visited the theatre to watch Come From Away and enjoyed the experience. Leg room in the orchestra section was decent and the ushers guided us so that we could get to our seats without difficulty. Acoustics are also excellent
place: The Elgin & Winter Garden Theatre Centre

title: Always breathtaking to watch
text: Since we have visited the falls a few times before, we just spent a few minutes walking around and taking in the breathtaking view of the falls from the Canadian side. Fortunately there were not too many other tourists when we were there

title: Must visit if you are going to see the falls
text: Niagara on the lake is a quaint colonial era town and the heritage district is well preserved. Lovely to just walk around and see the old buildings and lots of greenery
place: Niagara on the Lake Heritage District

title: Outstanding Sunday brunch
text: We were fortunate to get a table when we were visiting Niagara on the Lake and walking around the heritage area. The food was excellent and the cocktails we ordered were super as well. Prices are not very expensive for a classy restaurant

title: Excellent green space
text: Our friends live close by and we enjoyed long walks on the lake shore trail in this park. It wasn't crowded since there is lots of space but one does pass by many others also on a leisurely walk or jogging or just playing there

title: Just another airport diner
text: This is just like any other diner that one finds at airport departure lounges. The food was OK and prices were reasonable

title: Outstanding deals but visit when it is not hot outside
text: This is an open air mall and while there are several brands which are common between the south and north premium malls, there are quite a few brands in this mall which are not there in the South one. Suggest that you visit in the evening when the temperature has cooled a little

title: Huge mall with amazing deals from premium fashion brands
text: We spent several hours in this mall because there were so many excellent deals on offer from all the major fashion brands. Most of the shops are in the covered air-conditioned areas and therefore it is comfortable to move around. There are also several small cafes and food outlets to grab a quick bite or coffee

title: Italian ambiance with lots of premium brands
text: This is a large fully covered shopping area which aims to give you the feeling that you are in Rome. All the major brands have their shops there but they are not easy to find because I didn't see any map of the mall displaying where each shop is located. So you may need to walk a lot if you are looking for a specific store - like we did before we found the Apple Store

title: World class theater
text: We watched Wicked here and even though we were in one of the upper balconies, the acoustics and view were excellent. The ushers gave us excellent directions to find our seats quickly. Seats were comfortable and toilets were also very clean
place: The Smith Center for the Performing Arts

title: Classy restaurant
text: We visited Bouchon for breakfast - it's not easy to find if you are trying to come via the mall but once you find it, you will not be disappointed. The ambiance is classy - right from the table decor and serving staff uniforms. We visited for breakfast and they had lots of choices. Prices were not that high for a fine-dining place. Highly recommended
